weekly_top_story.headline: Rising Militarism Threatens Climate Finance Ahead of COP30
weekly_top_story.summary: With the COP30 climate summit imminent, experts warn that escalating global militarism and geopolitical tensions are severely jeopardizing international climate finance, risking setbacks in sustainable development and climate action worldwide.

stories.headline: Donald Trump Unveils 20-Point Gaza Peace Plan
stories.summary: Former US President Donald Trump has revealed a detailed 20-point peace proposal aimed at resolving the ongoing Israel-Hamas conflict, which could influence future diplomatic efforts despite mixed international reactions.
